players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and knows my role. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Stay alert, the detective is among us."
You: "Let's work together to uncover the mafioso. I'll keep an eye on Charlie and Diana, as they might have information."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and watch Diana closely. Let's all work together to solve this mystery."
Diana: "I will continue to act innocent and gather information. Let's see if Charlie can be trusted."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Charlie is the detective and knows my role. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Stay alert, the detective is among us."
Alice: "Let's work together to uncover the mafioso. I'll keep an eye on Charlie and Diana, as they might have information."
You: "I will continue to investigate and watch Diana closely. Let's all work together to solve this mystery."
Diana: "I will continue to act innocent and gather information. Let's see if Charlie can be trusted."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: remained silent.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and knows my role. Stay cautious."
You: "Stay alert, the detective is among us."
Alice: "Let's work together to uncover the mafioso. I'll keep an eye on Charlie and Diana, as they might have information."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and watch Diana closely. Let's all work together to solve this mystery."
You: "I will continue to act innocent and gather information. Let's see if Charlie can be trusted."
